# Szopy, Warmian–Masurian Voivodeship

Szopy  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Gronowo Elbląskie, within Elbląg County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north-east of Gronowo Elbląskie,  north-west of Elbląg, and  north-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
